item.title: [brc] Despark
item.description:
Instant

Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.

item.title: [brc] Chrome Courier
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Thopter

Flying

When Chrome Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. If you put an artifact card into your hand this way, you gain 3 life.

item.title: [brc] Brudiclad, Telchor Engineer
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Artificer

Creature tokens you control have haste.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 2/1 blue Phyrexian Myr artifact creature token. Then you may choose a token you control. If you do, each other token you control becomes a copy of that token.

item.title: [brc] Bedevil
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.

item.title: [brc] Silas Renn, Seeker Adept
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Human

Deathtouch

Whenever Silas Renn, Seeker Adept deals combat damage to a player, choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [brc] Sharuum the Hegemon
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Sphinx

Flying

When Sharuum the Hegemon enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [brc] Oni-Cult Anvil
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever one or more artifacts you control leave the battlefield during your turn, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Oni-Cult Anvil deals 1 damage to each opponent. You gain 1 life.

item.title: [brc] Jhoira, Weatherlight Captain
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

Whenever you cast a historic spell, draw a card. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

item.title: [brc] Sphinx's Revelation
item.description:
Instant

You gain X life and draw X cards.

item.title: [brc] Vindicate
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target permanent.

item.title: [brc] Hexavus
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Flying

Hexavus enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it.

{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Hexavus: Put a flying counter on another target creature.

{1}, Remove a counter from another creature you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on.

item.title: [brc] Kayla's Music Box
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{W}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library, then exile it face down. (You may look at it any time.)

{T}: Until end of turn, you may play cards you own exiled with Kayla's Music Box.

item.title: [brc] Machine God's Effigy
item.description:
Artifact

You may have Machine God's Effigy enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact and it has "{T}: Add {U}." (It's not a creature.)

{T}: Add {U}.

item.title: [brc] Scavenged Brawler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Flying, vigilance, trample, lifelink

{5}, Exile Scavenged Brawler from your graveyard: Choose target creature. Put four +1/+1 counters s, a flying counter, a vigilance counter, a trample counter, and a lifelink counter on that creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [brc] Smelting Vat
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice another artifact: Reveal the top eight cards of your library. Put up to two noncreature artifact cards with total mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value from among them onto the battlefield, and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [brc] Thopter Shop
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

{2}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

item.title: [brc] Wondrous Crucible
item.description:
Artifact

Permanents you control have ward {2}.

At the beginning of your end step, mill two cards, then exile a nonland card at random from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

item.title: [brc] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [brc] Darksteel Juggernaut
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Juggernaut

Indestructible

Darksteel Juggernaut's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.

Darksteel Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.

item.title: [brc] Cranial Plating
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.

{B}{B}: Attach Cranial Plating to target creature you control.

Equip {1}

item.title: [brc] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [brc] Chief of the Foundry
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

item.title: [brc] Azorius Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {W}{U}.

item.title: [brc] Hedron Archive
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

item.title: [brc] Fellwar Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [brc] Etched Champion
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Soldier

Metalcraft — Etched Champion has protection from all colors as long as you control three or more artifacts.

item.title: [brc] Dreamstone Hedron
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

item.title: [brc] Dimir Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {U}{B}.

item.title: [brc] Idol of Oblivion
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn.

{8}, {T}, Sacrifice Idol of Oblivion: Create a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token.

item.title: [brc] Ichor Wellspring
item.description:
Artifact

When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [brc] Metalwork Colossus
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of noncreature artifacts you control.

Sacrifice two artifacts: Return Metalwork Colossus from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [brc] Lithoform Engine
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{2}, {T}: Copy target activated or triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

{3}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

{4}, {T}: Copy target permanent spell you control. (The copy becomes a token.)

item.title: [brc] Liquimetal Torque
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Target nonland permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.

item.title: [brc] Mycosynth Wellspring
item.description:
Artifact

When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [brc] Mirrorworks
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever another nontoken artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that artifact.

item.title: [brc] Mind Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

item.title: [brc] Prophetic Prism
item.description:
Artifact

When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [brc] Orzhov Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {W}{B}.

item.title: [brc] Oblivion Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{4}, {T}: Put a fate counter on target permanent.

{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Oblivion Stone: Destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.

item.title: [brc] Nihil Spellbomb
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile target player's graveyard.

When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [brc] Myr Battlesphere
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Myr Construct

When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.

Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

item.title: [brc] Servo Schematic
item.description:
Artifact

When Servo Schematic enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

item.title: [brc] Relic of Progenitus
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard.

{1}, Exile Relic of Progenitus: Exile all graveyards. Draw a card.

item.title: [brc] Rakdos Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {B}{R}.

item.title: [brc] Steel Overseer
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

item.title: [brc] Steel Hellkite
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Dragon

Flying

{2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

{X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate only once each turn.

item.title: [brc] Spine of Ish Sah
item.description:
Artifact

When Spine of Ish Sah enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.

When Spine of Ish Sah is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spine of Ish Sah to its owner's hand.

item.title: [brc] Solemn Simulacrum
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

item.title: [brc] Swiftfoot Boots
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Equip {1}

item.title: [brc] Strionic Resonator
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")
